Entry.EnglishText: <Dio>

Entry.JapaneseText: エトス
Entry.EnglishText: Ethos

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mel>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mel>

Entry.JapaneseText: エルフの青年
Entry.EnglishText: Young Elf

Entry.JapaneseText: <Couleur>
Entry.EnglishText: <Couleur>

Entry.JapaneseText: Variable
レスター博士が、 あんな人なんて……
Entry.EnglishText: I would have never imagined the renowned Lester would be that kind of jerk...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、他にあてがないんだかラ。 さっき自分で言ったじゃない
Entry.EnglishText: But we can't rely on anyone else, this won't be the last time we have to deal with him.

Entry.JapaneseText: そう、だけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah...you are right, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: おや、<Claus>に客人か？
Entry.EnglishText: Oh hey, are you some visitors for <Claus>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 浮かない顔だな。 難癖つけられて、 追っ払われたってとこか
Entry.EnglishText: He isn't a very cheerful person. Yet, you shouldn't blame him or drive him away like that easily.

Entry.JapaneseText: はい、あの……わたしたち、 精霊のことで<Claus>さんに 相談があって……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, you see... we came here since we heard <Claus> would know something about Summon Spirits and...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんた、誰？
Entry.EnglishText: And just who do you think you are?

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと、<Dio>、 失礼でしょ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hold on, <Dio>, that's impolite....

Entry.JapaneseText: 僕はあの男の友人だ
Entry.EnglishText: I'm that guy's friend.

Entry.JapaneseText: こちらこそ、友人が 失礼したね
Entry.EnglishText: I should be the one saying you're impolite to my friend.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……本当は、 あんなヤツじゃないんだが……
Entry.EnglishText: ...As a matter of fact, he isn't such a bad person most of the time...

Entry.JapaneseText: 学会の幹部連中に、目の前で 召喚術の論文を燃やされた 頃からずっとあんな調子だ
Entry.EnglishText: A bunch of guys from the most privileged colleges burnt his Summoning thesis in front of everyone. It's no wonder he got furious.

Entry.JapaneseText: ひどい……
Entry.EnglishText: How could they be so cruel...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 学会の連中は、精霊の存在なんて 眉唾もんだって思ってるからね。 これ見よがしに論文を燃やして……
Entry.EnglishText: Those academic hypocrites did so to regard the Summon Spirits' existence as scientifically fake. He was the first to see his thesis burning...

Entry.JapaneseText: ミラルドが出て行ってからは もっとひどくなっていった
Entry.EnglishText: Shortly after that Milard left him and he's been getting worse since.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……僕が同じ仕打ちを受けたら…… 我慢できないだろうな
Entry.EnglishText: ...If I've received the same treatment like him...I'd be crushed...

Entry.JapaneseText: ところで、<Claus>に何を 相談したいんだい？
Entry.EnglishText: Anyways, what did you want to ask of <Claus>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 僕でも力になれることは ないかな？
Entry.EnglishText: It's just a guess but... you don't want to search for the Spirit's powers, are you?

Entry.JapaneseText: イフリートってヤツの いる洞窟へ行くんだよ
Entry.EnglishText: We were going to Efreet-whatever or other-'s cavern.

Entry.JapaneseText: イフリートだって！！ 君たちだけで行くつもりかい？ あそこは迷いやすいし、危険だ！
Entry.EnglishText: Efreet, you say!? Are you guys truly planning to travel there!? It's very easy to lose one's way there! You must proceed with utmost care!

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、これをあげよう
Entry.EnglishText: If you insist, you can have this.

Entry.JapaneseText: ど、どうしてこれを？
Entry.EnglishText: Why are you helping us?

Entry.JapaneseText: 君たちみたいな 子どもだけでは危険だろ。 だからさ
Entry.EnglishText: I can't just see some children entering a dangerous place and not do anything. That's why.

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当は、僕が付いていってあげたい んだけど……予定があってね……
Entry.EnglishText: I could go with you guys instead of just giving that but...I have plans already.

Entry.JapaneseText: 水の力を宿しているこの剣なら イフリートのいる<Red>熱砂の洞窟<White>の 魔物には効果があるはずだ
Entry.EnglishText: The power of water lies within that sword and is effective against the monsters that lurk in Efreet's place, the Cavern of Burning Sand.

Entry.JapaneseText: さて、僕はあいつの顔でも 見てくるよ。じゃあね
Entry.EnglishText: Now then, I'll go take a look at <Claus> myself. See you!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、だからって <Claus>さんのあんな言い方…… ないと、思う……
Entry.EnglishText: But if what he said is true then we don't need do what <Claus> said...I...think...

Entry.JapaneseText: よし、イフリート 連れてこようぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: All right! Let's lead the way to Efreet!

Entry.JapaneseText: 精霊連れてったら、レスター博士、 元気づけられっかもしんねー
Entry.EnglishText: If we find that Summon Spirit, I'm sure the renowned Lester will be back in top shape!

Entry.JapaneseText: そう、かな……
Entry.EnglishText: You're....right...

Entry.JapaneseText: どっちにしろ、精霊の力が 必要だったんだしさ、 ついでついで
Entry.EnglishText: We do have to get the Spirit's power at all costs, anyways, so this plays fair for us. We'll get to it, no problem!

Entry.JapaneseText: クルールル！
Entry.EnglishText: Kuruururu!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだね……うん
Entry.EnglishText: I agree, yeah!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>熱砂の洞窟<White>の イフリート、だっけ？
Entry.EnglishText: Efreet's Cavern of Burning Sand, was it?

Entry.JapaneseText: 粗暴で丸焦げにしちゃう って言ってたけド…… 気をつけないと……
Entry.EnglishText: He told us pretty harshly that we'd get completely burn... please be careful...

Entry.JapaneseText: オレらには 『なりきり士』の力が あんだから
Entry.EnglishText: All's good though, since we have the power of Roleplayer!

Entry.JapaneseText: 全然だいじょーぶだって。 行こーぜ
Entry.EnglishText: There's no problem about that, let's go!
